title: Demonstrators protest Trump across nation
shortDescription: Protesters appeared in cities across the U.S. as President Trump marked the first anniversary of his return to office.

title: Trump’s alleged Epstein note towers in DC
shortDescription: Activists displayed a 10-foot replica of Trump’s alleged birthday note to Epstein on the National Mall, sparking debate and visitor reactions.

title: Trump says he hopes Renee Good's father is still a 'fan'
shortDescription: President Trump said he hopes the father of Renee Good is still a 'Trump fan' after his daughter was shot and killed by an ICE agent.

title: Protesters rally on anniversary of Trump inauguration
shortDescription: On the one-year anniversary of President Donald Trump's inauguration of his second term, demonstrators took to the streets around the US to protest ICE.

title: Trump says ‘you’ll find out’ how far he'll go to take Greenland
shortDescription: The president has repeatedly declined to rule out military action against Denmark, the NATO member and US ally that controls Greenland.

title: Trump says NATO will be happy on Greenland
shortDescription: President Donald Trump told a reporter "you'll find out" how far he will go to acquire Greenland.

title: Congress just moved one big step closer to evading another shutdown
shortDescription: Lawmakers in Congress released their remaining funding bills meant to avoid a government shutdown after Jan. 30.

title: Can the 25th Amendment remove Trump from office? What to know
shortDescription: Lawmakers are calling on President Trump's cabinet and Congress to boot him from office using a never-before-invoked provision of the Constitution.

title: Trump says Good's parents were his fans
shortDescription: President Donald Trump says the parents of Renee Good were "tremendous Trump fans" and hopes they still are.

title: What 8 wars did Trump say he ended? He texted it to Norway’s prime minister
shortDescription: President Donald Trump's texts with Jonas Gahr Støre of Norway about Greenland were made public. He said he ended 8 wars. What is he referring to?

title: US, European countries send troops to Greenland amid Trump's threats
shortDescription: The U.S. military announced aircraft would soon arrive at Pituffik Space Base in Greenland, while stressing it is part of a "long-planned" exercise.

title: Extremist rhetoric has gone mainstream under Trump
shortDescription: Experts say President Donald Trump’s first year back in office saw extremist language and imagery go mainstream.

title: Trump clashes with NATO allies over Greenland
shortDescription: President Donald Trump posted AI images and leaked text messages as the dispute over Greenland dispute grows.
